question.title: Number of Distinct Binary Strings After Applying Operations
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Minimum Number of K Consecutive Bit Flips", "titleSlug": "minimum-number-of-k-consecutive-bit-flips", "difficulty": "Hard", "translatedTitle": null}]
hints: Notice that any string of the same length as s will always have the same answer, so only the length of the string matters.
For each substring of size k, you can decide whether to flip or not. Every string s resulting from this process will be unique.
How do you find the number of possible combinations?
